languages.text: Воспоминание истаяло, и поток серебристого ветра сорвал Лорд-капитана с места, швырнув в океан из ничего. Однако теперь "ничего" было угрюмо — никаких пестрых красок, лишь тени невидимых чудовищ проплывали мимо, сокрытые за мутной пеленой неизвестности.

traits.locale_text: Воспоминание тает, и поток серебристого ветра срывает Вольного Торговца с места и вновь выбрасывает {mf|его|ее} посреди океана из ничего. Однако теперь "ничего" угрюмо — нет больше пестрых красок, лишь тени невидимых чудовищ проплывают мимо, сокрытые за мутной пеленой неизвестности.

languages.text: The memory dissipated and a gust of silvery wind hurled the Lord Captain back into the ocean of nothingness. But this time, the nothingness felt dismal — instead of bright hues, all it contained was shadows of invisible monsters swimming by, shrouded by a nebulous veil of unfathomableness.
languages.original_text: Воспоминание истаяло, и поток серебристого ветра сорвал Лорд-капитана с места, швырнув в океан из ничего. Однако теперь "ничего" было угрюмо — никаких пестрых красок, лишь тени невидимых чудовищ проплывали мимо, сокрытые за мутной пеленой неизвестности.

traits.locale_text: The memory dissipated, and a gust of silvery wind tossed the Lord Captain back into the ocean of nothingness. But this time, the nothingness felt dismal — instead of bright hues, all it had was shadows of invisible monsters swimming by, shrouded by a nebulous veil of unfathomableness.

The memory dissipated, and a gust of silvery wind tossed the Lord Captain back into the ocean of nothingness. But this time, the nothingness felt dismal — instead of bright hues, all it had was shadows of invisible monsters swimming by, shrouded by a nebulous veil of unfathomableness.

The memory dissipated and a gust of silvery wind hurled the Lord Captain back into the ocean of nothingness. But this time, the nothingness felt dismal—instead of bright hues, all it had was shadows of invisible monsters swimming by, shrouded by a nebulous veil of unfathomableness.

The memory dissipated and a gust of silvery wind hurled the Lord Captain back into the ocean of nothingness. But this time, the nothingness felt dismal—instead of bright hues, all it had was shadows of invisible monsters swimming by, shrouded by a nebulous veil of unfathomableness.

The memory dissipated and a gust of silvery wind hurled the Lord Captain back into the ocean of nothingness. But this time, the nothingness felt dismal — instead of bright hues, all it contained was shadows of invisible monsters swimming by, shrouded by a nebulous veil of unfathomableness.

The memory dissipated and a gust of silvery wind hurled the Lord Captain back into the ocean of nothingness. But this time, the nothingness felt dismal — instead of bright hues, all it contained was shadows of invisible monsters swimming by, shrouded by a nebulous veil of unfathomableness.

languages.text: その記憶が霧散すると、一陣の銀の風がロード・キャプテンを無の海へと引き戻した。しかし今度の無は陰鬱な感じがした…明るい色はなく、見えない怪物が泳ぐ影だけが中に存在し、どこまでもおぼろげなヴェールに包まれていた。
languages.original_text: The memory dissipated and a gust of silvery wind hurled the Lord Captain back into the ocean of nothingness. But this time, the nothingness felt dismal — instead of bright hues, all it contained was shadows of invisible monsters swimming by, shrouded by a nebulous veil of unfathomableness.

traits.locale_text: その記憶が霧散すると、一陣の銀の風がロード・キャプテンを無の海へと引き戻した。しかし今度の無は陰鬱な感じがした…明るい色はなく、見えない怪物が泳ぐ影だけが中に存在し、どこまでもおぼろげなヴェールに包まれていた。

languages.text: 记忆消散了，一阵银色的风又把舰长大人吹回了虚无的海洋。但这一次，虚无之中充满了凄凉的感觉。明亮的色调无影无踪，只有无形的怪物游荡时投下的阴影，笼罩着一层深不可测的薄纱。
languages.original_text: The memory dissipated and a gust of silvery wind hurled the Lord Captain back into the ocean of nothingness. But this time, the nothingness felt dismal — instead of bright hues, all it contained was shadows of invisible monsters swimming by, shrouded by a nebulous veil of unfathomableness.

traits.locale_text: 记忆消散了，一阵银色的风又把舰长大人吹回了虚无的海洋。但这一次，虚无之中充满了凄凉的感觉。明亮的色调无影无踪，只有无形的怪物游荡时投下的阴影，笼罩着一层深不可测的薄纱。

languages.text: Au moment où le souvenir s'est dissipé, une bourrasque argentée a renvoyé {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} dans l'océan de néant, sauf que cette fois, le vide ne semblait plus abriter que des ombres de monstres invisibles, à peine perceptibles derrière un voile nébuleux et insondable.
languages.original_text: The memory dissipated and a gust of silvery wind hurled the Lord Captain back into the ocean of nothingness. But this time, the nothingness felt dismal — instead of bright hues, all it contained was shadows of invisible monsters swimming by, shrouded by a nebulous veil of unfathomableness.

traits.locale_text: Au moment où le souvenir s'est dissipé, une bourrasque argentée a renvoyé {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} dans l'océan de néant, sauf que cette fois, le vide ne semblait plus abriter que des ombres de monstres invisibles, à peine perceptibles derrière un voile nébuleux et insondable.

languages.text: El recuerdo se disipó, y una ráfaga de viento plateado arrojó {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán de vuelta a aquel océano de nada. Pero esta vez la nada tenía un aspecto sombrío; en lugar de tonos vivos, lo único que contenía eran las sombras de monstruos invisibles que nadaban envueltos en un velo nebuloso e insondable.
languages.original_text: The memory dissipated and a gust of silvery wind hurled the Lord Captain back into the ocean of nothingness. But this time, the nothingness felt dismal — instead of bright hues, all it contained was shadows of invisible monsters swimming by, shrouded by a nebulous veil of unfathomableness.

traits.locale_text: El recuerdo se disipó, y una ráfaga de viento plateado arrojó {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán de vuelta a aquel océano de nada. Pero esta vez la nada tenía un aspecto sombrío; en lugar de tonos vivos, lo único que había en ella eran las sombras de monstruos invisibles que nadaban envueltos en un velo nebuloso e insondable.

languages.text: Die Erinnerung verflog und eine Böe silbrigen Winds schleuderte den Lord Captain zurück in den Ozean aus Nichts. Doch dieses Mal fühlte sich das Nichts trostlos an. Statt bunter Farben schwammen nur die Schatten unsichtbarer Monster vorbei, in einen nebelhaften Schleier der Unergründlichkeit gehüllt.
languages.original_text: The memory dissipated and a gust of silvery wind hurled the Lord Captain back into the ocean of nothingness. But this time, the nothingness felt dismal — instead of bright hues, all it contained was shadows of invisible monsters swimming by, shrouded by a nebulous veil of unfathomableness.

traits.locale_text: Die Erinnerung verflog und eine Böe silbrigen Winds schleuderte den Lord Captain zurück in den Ozean aus Nichts. Doch dieses Mal fühlte sich das Nichts trostlos an. Statt bunter Farben schwammen nur die Schatten unsichtbarer Monster vorbei, in einen nebelhaften Schleier der Unergründlichkeit gehüllt.

languages.text: Anı kayboldu. Gümüşi bir rüzgâra kapılan Lord Kaptan, yeniden hiçlik deryasına döndü. Hiçlik bu kez kasvetliydi. Akıl ermez bir örtüyle saklanıp etrafta yüzen görünmez canavarların gölgeleri, parlak renklerin yerine geçmişti.
languages.original_text: The memory dissipated and a gust of silvery wind hurled the Lord Captain back into the ocean of nothingness. But this time, the nothingness felt dismal — instead of bright hues, all it contained was shadows of invisible monsters swimming by, shrouded by a nebulous veil of unfathomableness.

traits.locale_text: Anı kayboldu. Gümüşi bir rüzgâra kapılan Lord Kaptan, yeniden hiçlik deryasına döndü. Bu kez hiçlik, kasvetliydi... Akıl ermez bir örtüyle saklanıp etrafta yüzen görünmez canavarların gölgeleri, parlak renklerin yerine geçmişti.
